1645850.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meanders Asset Pack 8
1645850.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Meanders Asset Pack 8

This Asset Pack features 150+ pre-sized tokens for FGU and FGC with a wide range of assets to suit fantasy games and the Meanders Map series offering art assets that match.
This asset set features a rich assortment of varied dungeon and fantasy dressings included:
o Wooden and Metal Banded Crates and Chests
o Chairs, Tables and Furnishings
o Barrels and Books, Parchment and Magical Grimoires
o Desks, Bookshelves and Display Cases
o Market Stalls, Sacks and Wares
o 8 Horses, 1 Bull
o Light Sources (Lamp, Torch, Brazier)
o Carts, Rug, Grate, Stairs and Ladder
o World Map, Iron Spike Trap, Stone Pillar
o Bucket, Dwarven Features, Door, Pottery, Tombstone, Trapdoor
o Treasure and Trap Chest
o Broken/Ruined Furnishings
o Bed, Blood Spatter, Canopies, Animal Crate, and Alchemist Bench
[Meanders Maps on which assets are illustrated not included]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
Kris Mc Dermott
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
